Education_Test_Rule_Snapshot_Data.description: Education Test Rule Snapshot Line Data

validation.validation: Enter a Minimum Score that is within the Minimum Score and Maximum Score configured for this test section on the Create Education Test or Edit Education Test task.
A transfer credit rule is already in use for this Minimum Score and Effective Date. Enter a different Minimum Score or Effective Date.
You must either select No Internal Equivalent or complete the Internal Equivalent section.
Specify transfer credit reasons that belong either to the same institution as the transfer credit rule, or the institution associated with the academic unit hierarchy of the transfer credit rule.
Please select a valid education test section for the specified education test.
You can either add a transfer credit rule for a different Effective Date or edit the rule for the current date.

Specify a unique rule. A rule already exists for this combination of the education test and associated test section along with the academic unit hierarchy: [Education Test]: [Education Test Section] - [Academic Hierarchy]
Specify only 1 of these options: Program of Study, Academic Unit, or both an Academic Level and Academic Unit.
There is no Academic Unit Configuration for the Academic Unit and Academic Level you've specified. Specify an Academic Unit and Academic Level with an Academic Unit Configuration.
